person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CRICKET - WEST INDIES 172 ALL OUT IN 49.2 OVERS V AUSTRALIA .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| CRICKET |
| WEST INDIES |
| AUSTRALIA |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions three entities: "CRICKET", "WEST INDIES", and "AUSTRALIA". These are all valid "Person" entities in the context of cricket, where "CRICKET" can be considered as a collective entity representing the sport, and "WEST INDIES" and "AUSTRALIA" are teams.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| WEST INDIES |
| AUSTRALIA |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions two clear "Person" entities: "WEST INDIES" and "AUSTRALIA", which are cricket teams. "CRICKET" is not a person and can be considered as a collective noun representing the sport.
